name: Butternut Squash Pasta

ingredients.name: frozen peeled and diced butternut squash

preparation: In Multipurpose Steamer, combine pasta and hot water. Top with tray; place squash on tray. Cover; microwave on high 12 min until pasta and squash are tender.
Meanwhile, thinly slice chicken; season with salt and pepper. In Wok, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add chicken; stir-fry until golden-brown and cooked through, about 5 min. Remove from heat.
Once pasta and squash are cooked, using a spoon, place squash in blender. Drain pasta; set aside. Add milk, butter and dip mix to blender; pur√©e. Mixture will be thick.
Add drained pasta, sauce, and cheese to wok; toss to coat. Taste and season with more salt and pepper, if desired. Spoon into bowls and add toppings, if desired.
tips: Swap milk for cream for a richer sauce.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups leafy greens and 1 tbsp Epicure Dressing, your choice

summary: Classic notes of chives, onion & garlic.

summary: Classic Wok with curvy side & generous surface area for stir-frying.

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
